verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, You're leading me (echo)
With a cloud by day (echo)
And then in the night (echo)
The glow of a burning flame (echo)
And everywhere I go, I see You (echo)
And everywhere I go, I see You (echo)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And You take my hand (echo)
And You wash it clean (echo)
I know the promised land (echo)
Is light years ahead of me (echo)
And everywhere I go, I see You (echo)
And everywhere I go, I see You (echo)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Well, the eagle flies (echo)
And the rivers run (echo)
I look through the night (echo)
And I can see the rising sun (echo)
And everywhere I go, I see You (echo)
And everywhere I go, I see You (echo)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Well, the grass will die (echo)
And the flowers fall (echo)
But Your Word's alive (echo)
And it will be after all (echo)
And everywhere I go, I see You (echo)
And everywhere I go, I see You (echo)

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
And everywhere I go, I see You (echo)
And everywhere I go, I see You (echo)
And everywhere I go, I see You (Together)
And everywhere I go, I see You (Together)
